item.title: How do i make npcs talk in delta?
item.dc:creator: @OBLITERSCAPE OBLITERSCAPE
item.description:
@OBLITERSCAPE wrote:

this maybe?

                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID HERE!) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "What you want it to say here";
